name: ListRoutingFormSubmissions
description:
Retrieve submissions for a specific routing form.

Get a list of submissions made to a specific routing form in Calendly.

parameters.name: routing_form_uri
parameters.description: The URI of the routing form to view its submissions.

value_schema.description: View routing form submissions associated with the routing form's URI.

parameters.name: number_of_rows_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of form submission rows to return.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token used for retrieving the next or previous set of routing form submissions based on pagination.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: order_results_by_field
parameters.description: Comma-separated list to order results by {field}:{direction}, e.g., 'created_at:asc'.

value_schema.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values. Supported fields are: created_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: form
parameters.description: View routing form submissions associated with the routing form's URI.

value_schema.description: View routing form submissions associated with the routing form's URI.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values. Supported fields are: created_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

value_schema.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values. Supported fields are: created_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
